name: Shooting the Zombies
description:
This is a Zombie shooter made with Game Maker Studio 1.4.  Thanks to Bros before Giraffes for his tutorial Videos!

Watch the Playlist here: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL0IekdDMkSChRvE73z7G21cldYFils0C-

It's based on Doom Textures from the Textures Recource. There is currently no release date. Project file is included. Demo realeased
